original_text: Listen, my child, when your father shows you what is right. And do not forget what your mother has taught you.
korean_text: 내 아들아 네 아비의 훈계를 들으며 네 어미의 법을 떠나지 말라

sentences.original_text: when your father shows you what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아비가 네게 바른 것을 가르칠 때에.

sentences.original_text: what your mother has taught you.
